product_name: Ortlieb Front-Roller High Visibility Panniers - Pair
long_description: Keep your goods dry and protected during bike tours and commutes in the top-shelf Ortlieb Front-Roller High Visibility Bike Panniers. Designed for front bike racks, they offer extra visibility. PVC-free fabric made of coated nylon offers waterproof toughness, and interwoven reflective yarn enhances visibility. QL2.1 system fits racks up to 16mm tube diameter and includes adapter for 8, 10 and 12mm tubes. Inner pocket; large reflectors; shoulder carrying strap. Ortlieb Front-Roller High Visibility Bike Pannier come as a pair.
short_description: Keep your goods dry and protected during bike tours and commutes in the top-shelf Ortlieb Front-Roller High Visibility Bike Panniers. Designed for front bike racks, they offer extra visibility.
